channel.title: New to all this
channel.description:
Hi, Seeing as i'm new to all this, i had a private server about 4-5 years ago but i only changed a few things on the server i downloaded instead of making one.
Now, i'm back and i would like to learn how to code so i can make a good server. Not for donations or anything like that, I couldn't care less about the money, I just want my own server that i can work on and make into something great, no matter how long it takes.
But i know you don't want my life story so i'll get to the point, where do i start learning for all this? Any help would be appreciated.
P.S. Sorry if this is in the wrong section. Exzilled

item.title: New to all this
item.dc:creator: @Exzilled Exzilled
item.description:
@Exzilled wrote:

Thanks to both of you; that link will help a lot. I’ll get started straight away.

Exzilled.

Read full topic

item.title: New to all this
item.dc:creator: @Wank Broham
item.description:
@Wank wrote:

You should start off here:
http://docs.oracle.com/javase/tutorial/

When you need help or something take a look at the Java docs for reminders as well, you can go and find a good e-book online, or you can go and buy a book of java in real life and read that. You can also look at java tutorials online for example, thenewbostons java tutorial I thought was pretty well done.

Just depends how you learn best. Good luck to ya.

Read full topic

item.title: New to all this
item.dc:creator: @marcbob marcbob
item.description:
@marcbob wrote:

Java’s website has some pretty helpful tutorials.

Read full topic

item.title: New to all this
item.dc:creator: @Exzilled Exzilled
item.description:
@Exzilled wrote:

Yeah I’ve already done all that, I’m more on about how to make sense of all the files, learn the code that’s used in making a server.
So I don’t have to leech a source to make a server, I’d like to make one that’s completely my own.
How do i go about learning that code? I don’t even know where to start.
Thanks.

Exzilled

Read full topic

item.title: New to all this
item.dc:creator: @marcbob marcbob
item.description:
@marcbob wrote:

http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,342685.0.html - This would be a great place to start.

Read full topic
